title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2102.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2102.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of field audits is to investigate, review and
report on the methods and procedures used by lenders and schools in the
preparation, processing and maintenance of educational loan forms and
records. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2102.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
